programme.title: Spencer's Holiday BBQ
programme.sub-title: Spencer's Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Spencer grills and smokes his way through traditional holiday dishes with a festive menu that includes Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie and Smoked Turkey Two Ways.

programme.desc: To get in the holiday spirit, Jessica McGovern bakes a decadent chocolate yule log stuffed with a creamy salted caramel frosting, and follows it up with a holiday-inspired cake decorated with homemade peppermint candy canes.
